package.name: emizenmobileadmin
package.summary: You can Now Track you all the Magento Backend Activity Using our Emizentech Magento Mobile Apps . IT has very great feature API to display All the Sales Activity with Graph . You can now easily see all the Magento Orders Listing , Product Listing, Customer Listing .
package.description:
You can Now Track you all the Magento Backend Activity Using our Emizentech Magento Mobile Apps . IT has very great feature API to display All the Sales Activity with Graph . You can now easily see all the Magento Orders Listing , Product Listing, Customer Listing .
Features :
* Wonderful View of your Sales with Days Filter Graph * Sales Listing View with Details. * Customer Listing View with Details * Product Listing View With Details * Store view Selection For Dashboard, * Multistore Support
package.notes:
You can Now Track you all the Magento Backend Activity Using our Emizentech Magento Mobile Apps . IT has very great feature API to display All the Sales Activity with Graph . You can now easily see all the Magento Orders Listing , Product Listing, Customer Listing .
